name: shipshipship
description: ShipShipShip is a self-hosted deployment dashboard for managing and tracking releases across environments. It helps teams visualize deployments and versions with a simple, opinionated release UI.
features: Deployment tracking: Visualizes which versions are deployed across environments.
Release timeline: Displays deployment history with timestamps and version numbers.
Environment comparison: Shows version differences between dev, staging, and production.
Team notifications: Alerts team members when new deployments occur.
Rollback tracking: Records rollback events and reasons for audit purposes.
Service grouping: Organizes multiple services and microservices in unified view.
Version badges: Generates embeddable badges showing current deployment status.
API integration: Connects with CI/CD pipelines to auto-update deployment status.
Custom environments: Defines unlimited custom environments beyond standard dev/staging/prod.
Deployment notes: Attaches release notes and changelogs to each deployment.
Access control: Restricts visibility and editing permissions by team role.
Webhook support: Triggers external systems on deployment events.
